attributes.action: Let the People of the UK Have Their Say: THE BIG REVOLUTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time the people of the UK had a REAL say about how their country is run. We want the Government to hold a National Survey as to how the public want their MPs to act to better serve their constituents, how the Public want their NHS to be run, how the Public want the Taxes to be spent and how the Public want the benefits system to be changed to help those who will actually help themselves, rather than scrounge.
